Query.CommandText: select u.shortname, cd.companyname, cd.clientdate, s.display, sum(sd.subtotal) as revenue from contactdetails cd inner join salesheader sh on sh.lead_id = cd.id inner join salesdetails sd on sd.salesheader_id = sh.id inner join users u on u.id = sh.assignedto left join source s on s.id = cd.leadsource where clientdate between @startdate and @enddate group by cd.id, u.shortname, cd.companyname, cd.clientdate, s.display order by u.shortname, cd.companyname

select distinct u.shortname, s.display, count(*) as num, 1 from contactdetails cd inner join salesheader sh on sh.lead_id = cd.id inner join users u on u.id = sh.assignedto left join source s on s.id = cd.leadsource where clientdate between @startdate and @enddate and leadsource in (2,6,7) group by u.shortname, s.display union select u.shortname, 'Misc', count(*) as num, 2 from contactdetails cd inner join salesheader sh on sh.lead_id = cd.id inner join users u on u.id = sh.assignedto left join source s on s.id = cd.leadsource where clientdate between @startdate and @enddate and leadsource not in (2,6,7) group by u.shortname, s.display order by u.shortname, 4, s.display
